seo.title: ExperienceQR - AI-Powered Digital Experience Platform for Any Venue
seo.description: Transform visitor experiences with AI-powered souvenir cards. Multilingual voice guides & QR collectibles for museums, attractions & events. No app needed.
seo.keywords: AI souvenir cards, interactive museum guide, digital exhibition cards, QR code tour guide, multilingual AI assistant, museum technology, visitor engagement, collectible cards, audio guide alternative, museum souvenir, exhibition technology, tourist attraction cards, trade show cards, conference materials, hotel concierge AI, no-app experience
seo.structured_description: AI-Powered Interactive Souvenir Cards for Museums, Exhibitions, Tourist Attractions, Trade Shows, Conferences, and Events Worldwide
seo.audience: Museums, Exhibitions, Tourist Attractions, Trade Shows, Conferences, Hotels, Restaurants, Events

dashboard.manage_cards_description: Manage your projects, content, and issuance.
dashboard.confirm_delete_card_message: Are you sure you want to delete '{name}'? This action cannot be undone.
dashboard.access_mode_cannot_change: Access mode cannot be changed after creation. This ensures billing and content structure consistency.
dashboard.physical_card_full_desc: Create a printed souvenir card with QR code. Visitors scan to see the card overview page first, then explore content.
dashboard.digital_access_full_desc: Create a QR code that links directly to content. No physical card needed - perfect for link-in-bio, digital menus, or quick access.
dashboard.physical_mode_hint: Your card will be printed as a physical souvenir. Visitors scan the QR code to see the card overview first (with image and description), then explore content.
dashboard.digital_mode_hint: Your QR code will link to a welcome page with your description, then visitors explore content. No card image is displayed.
dashboard.digital_no_image_desc: Digital access shows a welcome page with your description. The card image is not displayed to visitors.
dashboard.digital_description_hint: This description will be displayed on the welcome page when visitors scan your QR code.
dashboard.digital_no_image_hint: Switch to Physical Card if you need to display a card image on the overview page.
dashboard.digital_desc_not_displayed: For digital access, the card description is not displayed to visitors (overview page is skipped). You can still add internal notes here if needed.
dashboard.enter_qr_name: Enter a name for this QR code...
dashboard.content_mode_tooltip: Choose how your content will be displayed to visitors. This affects the mobile layout.
dashboard.mode_single_guidance: Best for: Single article, product detail, announcement. Create 1 content item that displays as full page.
dashboard.mode_list_guidance: Best for: Link-in-bio, resource lists, simple menus. Each content item displays as a list row.
dashboard.mode_grid_guidance: Best for: Photo galleries, product catalogs, portfolios. Items display in a 2-column grid layout.
dashboard.mode_cards_guidance: Best for: Featured items, articles, announcements. Each item displays as a full-width card with image and description.
dashboard.grouping_description: Group your content items under category headers. Parent items become categories, child items are listed under them.
dashboard.group_display_expanded_desc: Items shown directly under category headers on the same page
dashboard.group_display_collapsed_desc: Tap category to navigate and view items inside
dashboard.migrate_to_grouped_message: This will organize your existing content into categories. A default category will be created and all current items will be moved under it. You can then create more categories and drag items between them.
dashboard.migration_failed: Failed to organize content. Please try again.
dashboard.migrate_to_flat_message: This will flatten your content structure. All items will become top-level items and empty categories will be removed.
dashboard.flatten_failed: Failed to flatten content. Please try again.
dashboard.placeholder_solo: Write your bio, contact info, or introduction here...
dashboard.placeholder_stack: Brief description of your link collection (optional)...
dashboard.placeholder_description: Describe your project's purpose and content using Markdown...
dashboard.req_one_content_item: Add 1 content item (displays as full page)
dashboard.link_hint: Paste a URL and it will become a clickable button
dashboard.link_mode_hint: Each link becomes a clickable button. No image needed.
dashboard.chapter_hint: Chapters organize your content. Add steps inside each chapter.
dashboard.chapter_mode_hint: Chapters are the main sections. Add steps inside each one.
dashboard.enter_step_name: e.g., Step 1, Artifact A, First Task...
dashboard.step_hint: Steps are the detailed content within a chapter.
dashboard.step_mode_hint: Steps are detailed items within a chapter.
dashboard.originalLanguageTooltip: Select the language you're writing your content in. This helps the AI translation system understand your original text and generate accurate translations.
dashboard.ai_enabled_note: AI assistance is enabled. These settings guide the AI when interacting with visitors.
dashboard.delete_cards_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete {count} project(s)? This action cannot be undone.
dashboard.export_single_file_desc: All projects in one file with indexed sheets
dashboard.start_creating: Start by creating your first project
dashboard.no_cards_match_search: No projects match your search criteria.
dashboard.drag_drop_upload: Drag and drop or click to upload
dashboard.image_requirements_text: Upload JPG or PNG files up to 5MB. For best results, use images with a 2:3 aspect ratio (e.g., 800×1200px). You can crop and adjust your image after uploading.
dashboard.ai_role_purpose: Define how the AI should behave and respond to visitor questions
dashboard.ai_role_example: Example: You are a knowledgeable and friendly AI assistant for museum and exhibition visitors...
dashboard.allow_visitors_ask: Allow visitors to ask questions about your content
dashboard.purpose_define_ai: Purpose: Define the AI's role, personality, tone, and any restrictions or guidelines it should follow. Keep it concise (max 100 words).
dashboard.knowledge_base_placeholder: Provide background knowledge, facts, historical context, specifications, or domain expertise that strengthens the AI's ability to answer questions accurately. Be detailed and comprehensive.
dashboard.knowledge_purpose: Purpose: Supply detailed domain knowledge, historical facts, specifications, or context that helps the AI provide accurate, informative responses about your content (max 2000 words).
dashboard.ai_welcome_general_placeholder: Hi! I'm your personal guide. Ask me anything - directions, info, recommendations!
dashboard.ai_welcome_general_hint: Personal concierge that can answer any question using experience-level knowledge. Leave blank for default.
dashboard.ai_welcome_item_placeholder: Hi! I'm an expert on {name}. What would you like to know?
dashboard.ai_welcome_item_hint: Focused guide for specific content items with specialized expertise. Use {name} for item name. Leave blank for default.
dashboard.image_requirements_content: Upload JPG or PNG files up to 5MB. Recommended aspect ratio: {ratio} for optimal display. You can crop and adjust your image after uploading.
dashboard.ai_knowledge_purpose_content: Purpose: Provide content-specific knowledge for this {type}. Include facts, specifications, historical details, or contextual information that helps the AI answer visitor questions accurately (max 500 words).
dashboard.mobile_preview_description: See how your experience will appear to visitors on mobile devices
dashboard.live_preview: Live preview of your mobile experience
dashboard.preview_access_denied: Preview access denied. You can only preview your own cards.
dashboard.failed_load_preview_content: Failed to load mobile preview content
dashboard.card_knowledge_purpose: Provide background knowledge and context about your exhibition or collection
dashboard.choose_card_to_view: Choose a project from the list to view its details
dashboard.create_first_card_instruction: Create your first project by clicking the '+' button
dashboard.manage_card_subtitle: Manage your project design, content, and issuance.

content.reorder_tip: Drag items to rearrange their display order

content.single_mode_empty_desc: Add your page content with title, description, and optional image.
content.grouped_mode_empty_desc: Add categories to organize items into groups. Each category can contain multiple items.
content.list_mode_empty_desc: Add items to create a simple list. Perfect for links, contacts, or quick references.
content.grid_mode_empty_desc: Add items with images to create a visual gallery. Perfect for menus, portfolios, or catalogs.
content.inline_mode_empty_desc: Add full-width cards with images and descriptions. Perfect for featured content or announcements.

content.delete_item_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

hero.subtitle_part2: — instantly. No app required. Perfect for museums, restaurants, malls, and any venue.

about.title: Discover
about.intro: ExperienceQR transforms any venue into an interactive AI-powered guide. A simple QR code scan unlocks tailored content and AI voice conversations on any mobile device—instant and app-free.
about.description1: Designed for museums, restaurants, shopping malls, events, and any venue worldwide. Replace static displays and brochures with engaging digital experiences. AI assistants answer questions, provide guidance, and create deeper connections with your audience.
about.description2: Optional physical cards available as collectible souvenirs, adding premium keepsake value to the digital experience.
about.description3: Try ExperienceQR and see the difference. Launch easily with our one-stop service.

demo.title: See
demo.subtitle: Try both access modes below to experience the difference.

physical_card.title: Physical Card
physical_card.desc: Printed collectible souvenir with QR code
physical_card.hint: Visitors see the card image first, then explore content
physical_card.caption: Example of a printed physical card with QR code
physical_card.full_desc: Physical cards are printed collectible souvenirs with an embedded QR code. Visitors scan to see the card overview page first (displaying the card image and description), then explore the interactive content. Perfect for museums, events, and venues wanting to offer premium keepsakes.

digital_access.title: Digital Access
digital_access.desc: QR code link directly to content
digital_access.hint: Visitors go directly to welcome page and content
digital_access.caption: QR code provides instant digital access to content
digital_access.full_desc: Digital access uses a QR code that links directly to your content—no physical card needed. Ideal for digital menus, link-in-bio, event programs, or any scenario where quick, app-free access is key. Visitors scan and instantly explore your AI-powered experience.

features.qr_access_desc: Scan with any smartphone. No app downloads needed.
features.ai_voice_desc: Natural voice conversations adapted to visitor interests.
features.keepsakes_desc: Premium cards visitors keep as digital souvenirs.

demo_templates.title: Try Our Demo Projects
demo_templates.subtitle: Scan any QR code below to experience ExperienceQR in action. See how AI-powered interactive guides work in real-world scenarios.
demo_templates.no_description: Experience this demo to see our platform in action.
demo_templates.scan_or_click: Scan QR code or click to open
demo_templates.scan_qr_hint: Or scan the QR code on your phone
demo_templates.scan_to_view: Scan to view on your phone
demo_templates.scan_hint: Use your mobile camera to scan and experience this demo

content_modes.title: Flexible
content_modes.subtitle: Choose the perfect layout for your content. Each layout is optimized for different use cases with optional grouping and AI assistants that adapt to your structure.

single.name: Single Page
single.use_case: Product details, event info, announcements, articles
single.ai_single: Personal AI assistant with full knowledge base - answers any question about the content
single.ai_note: Single mode uses one unified AI assistant since there's only one content item

grid.name: Grid Gallery
grid.use_case: Photo galleries, portfolios, product catalogs, exhibitions
grid.ai_general: Personal guide with full gallery knowledge - answers any question
grid.ai_item: Expert on the specific item with detailed background

list.name: List
list.ai_general: Personal assistant with experience-level knowledge - answers any question
list.ai_item: Dedicated guide for the specific item with focused expertise

cards.name: Cards
cards.ai_general: Personal assistant with complete experience knowledge - answers any question
cards.ai_item: Specialized guide for the specific featured item

content_modes.setup_desc: Configure in seconds from the CMS dashboard. No coding required.
content_modes.mobile_desc: Responsive design that looks perfect on any device.
content_modes.grouping_desc: Organize items into categories. Choose to show items inline or after clicking the category.
content_modes.grouping_flat_desc: Simple layout without categories - all items displayed directly
content_modes.grouping_expanded_desc: Items organized under category headers, all visible on one page
content_modes.grouping_collapsed_desc: Categories shown first, tap to navigate and view items inside

how_it_works.title: Simple
how_it_works.subtitle: Launch your AI-powered digital experience in minutes—no technical skills required.

steps.create_desc: Build your project and add content through our intuitive dashboard.
steps.share_desc: Display the QR code on signage, menus, or marketing materials.
steps.engage_desc: Visitors scan and instantly interact with your AI-powered guide.

features.collectible_desc: Instant access via QR code. Optional physical cards for souvenir value.
features.ai_guide_desc: Real-time conversations with context awareness and follow-up questions.
features.no_app_desc: Instant access via any smartphone camera. No downloads, no friction.
features.portal_config_desc: Configure and update content through intuitive web portal anytime.
features.multilingual_desc: Content and conversations in 10+ languages from one upload.
features.no_hardware_desc: Uses visitors' own phones. No expensive equipment to buy or maintain.
features.dashboard_desc: Self-service platform for content management, analytics, and QR issuance.

applications.title: Where ExperienceQR
applications.subtitle: ExperienceQR transforms any venue into an interactive AI-powered destination. Swipe to explore:

museums.name: Museums & Exhibitions
museums.role: Your personalized multi-language AI museum docent
museums.alternatives: Real person docents, audio guides, printed gallery guides, wall text translations
museums.benefit1: Bring artifacts and exhibits to life with deep-dive storytelling
museums.benefit2: Experience multilingual tours and accessibility features
museums.benefit3: Discover fascinating details based on your interests and questions

tourist.name: Tourist Attractions & Landmarks
tourist.alternatives: Printed brochures and static displays of landmark history
tourist.benefit1: Transform landmark visits with rich historical context and cultural heritage insights
tourist.benefit2: Navigate with confidence while discovering authentic narratives
tourist.benefit3: Learn local stories behind iconic destinations

zoos.name: Zoos & Aquariums
zoos.alternatives: Real person zoo guides, zoo guidebooks, and educational handouts
zoos.benefit1: Engage with species information and conservation stories
zoos.benefit2: Check feeding schedules and animal facts
zoos.benefit3: Inspire wonder and education through interactive conversations about wildlife and habitats

trade_shows.name: Trade Shows & Exhibition Centers
trade_shows.alternatives: Product catalogs, brochures, business cards, and company profile leaflets
trade_shows.benefit1: Deliver dynamic product demonstrations and detailed company profiles
trade_shows.benefit2: Provide comprehensive spec sheets and technical information
trade_shows.benefit3: Boost exhibitor exposure and drive sales—all from a single premium card

conferences.name: Academic Conferences
conferences.alternatives: Printed conference handouts and paper booklets
conferences.benefit1: Get answers about research papers and speaker bios
conferences.benefit3: Turn conferences into interactive learning experiences

training.name: Training and Events
training.alternatives: Event programs, training notes and handouts, and speaker bios
training.benefit1: Access session summaries and speaker bios
training.benefit2: Explore networking opportunities and key takeaways
training.benefit3: Get instant AI explanations of complex topics on demand

hotels.name: Hotels & Resorts
hotels.role: Your personal AI concierge in your language
hotels.alternatives: Welcome cards for guests, tour recommendation leaflets, in-room directories, service catalogs, restaurant menus
hotels.benefit1: Discover personalized property amenities info and local attraction recommendations
hotels.benefit2: Get dining suggestions and tailored guest services
hotels.benefit3: Premium keepsakes that create memorable stays

restaurants.name: Restaurants & Fine Dining
restaurants.alternatives: Printed menus, multilingual menu cards, server explanations, dish description cards
restaurants.benefit1: Experience instant multi-language menu translations and immersive dish introductions
restaurants.benefit2: Learn about ingredients, preparation methods, chef stories, and wine pairings
restaurants.benefit3: Get dietary accommodations through natural conversations—elevating the dining experience for international guests

applications.cta: Find Your Fit – Contact Us for a Pilot

venue_benefits.engagement: Boost engagement with interactive AI content
venue_benefits.global: Attract global crowds with multilingual access
venue_benefits.sustainability: Meet ESG sustainability goals by reducing paper waste

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.a1: ExperienceQR is an AI-powered digital experience platform that transforms any venue into an interactive guide. Visitors scan a QR code to access multilingual content and conversational AI assistants—no app required. Physical cards available as optional collectible souvenirs.
faq.a2:
1) Place QR codes at your venue (or use physical cards)
2) Visitors scan with their smartphone
3) Access AI assistant and digital content instantly
4) Optional: Cards become collectible souvenirs
faq.q3: Do visitors need to download an app?
faq.a3: No. ExperienceQR works through any smartphone browser. Simply scan the QR code—nothing to download or install.
faq.a4: Content and AI conversations are available in 10+ languages: English, Mandarin, Cantonese, Japanese, Korean, Thai, Arabic, Spanish, French, Russian, and more.
faq.a5: Start free with 3 projects and 50 monthly access. Premium ($50/month) includes 15 projects, 3,000 monthly access, translations, and priority support. All plans include AI voice, content dashboard, QR codes, analytics, and hosting.
faq.q6: How quickly can we get started?
faq.a6: Digital QR projects can launch within minutes. Sign up, create your project, and share your QR code instantly. Physical cards take 2-3 weeks for printing and shipping.
faq.q7: Can we customize the content and AI?
faq.a7: Yes. Full customization using our self-service dashboard. Manage content, configure AI assistant behavior, set welcome messages, and update anytime.
faq.q8: What is the card production timeline?
faq.a8: Physical cards print within 4 business days. Shipping takes 5-10 days depending on your location. Digital QR experiences are instant.
faq.a9: Free tier: 50 monthly access across all projects. Premium: 3,000 monthly access included, with overage available (5 credits = 100 extra access). Physical cards have unlimited scans once issued.
faq.still_have_questions: Still have questions? Reach out via our Contact form.
